reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater looks better after washing and appreciate its well-made construction, nice fit, and lightweight design. They describe it as comfortable, with high-quality material, and one customer mentions it's perfect for a champagne brunch. The softness receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it's not very soft, and customers disagree on whether it runs true to size.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Uber cute sweater!
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised by the fit and quality of this sweater! It was perfect for a low key New Yearâ€™s Eve. Material is sturdy and comfortable. Color is a pretty blush pink. Could be dresses up or dressed down. I wore with jeans and cute sneakers. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater
items.body: Super cute, looks better after a wash/dry! True to size. Fun & cute. You can see a bit of the black stitching, as the photo shows, but it does look better after a wash and light tumble dry Read more
items.author: Shoppa Khan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater runs big
items.body: Adorable, lightweight sweater. Consider sizing down at least one size. Large and boxy fit. Read more
items.author: Amber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute sweater!
items.body: Not a real soft sweater but has some weight to it! Really cute for the price, washed well. I recommend this if you are a champagne lover ðŸ¥‚ðŸ¾ Read more
items.author: Charyl

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap looking
items.body: Ink is not lined up correctly on the sweater. It looks very cheap for the price Read more
items.author: Divakay1248

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not so good
items.body: This is cute in theory but there are so many places where the stitching is poorly done. The sweater itself seems good quality and the brown is a great color. From a size perspective I am 175 lb and I am 5'8 tall and they recommended the extra large. The extra large fits in the arms and the length but the sides cut up way too high and show your love handles.. I took this to a seamstress to see about fixing it but it would look awful because you would have to cut before you sew. Taking it back. I guess you get what you pay for this thing is only 25 bucks I'm sure most of you will think it's okay. I would rather just pay a lot more and get the non knockoff sweater from wooden ships Read more
items.author: Paige

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink heart light sweater,
items.body: Cutest light sweater, fits perfectly. Bright pink the color is great. Very comfy side slits arenâ€™t too high, you can wear a tank underneath. Ordered a large, 180 pounds, would buy again. I actually ordered the shamrock sweater as well wore it on St Patrickâ€™s day. Read more
items.author: Detes

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Desert Palm, Pink, White, Z-merry, Z-halloween Pumpkin, Z-gray, Z-halloween Boo, Z-merry and Bright, Black, Pink Heart. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
